content.prompt:
Used by permission

In its original context, the Lenape bandolier bag shown would have signaled to an onlooker that its wearer was

choices.label: highly skilled as an embroiderer to be able to create such complex patterns
a Lenape woman, communicated by the use of geometric designs
a Lenape soldier, since such bags were used to carry firearm ammunition
prosperous enough to have access to non-Native American trade goods

topic.text: 5.3: Purpose and Audience in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
